title: ResetRelativeToEnum
description: The enumerated values to specify whether resets occur relative to the first or last day of a calculation period.

oneOf.title: CalculationPeriodEndDate
oneOf.description: Resets occur relative to the last day of a calculation period.

oneOf.title: CalculationPeriodStartDate
oneOf.description: Resets occur relative to the first day of a calculation period.
